Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

A long while ago, my grandma gave me a VHS with a space documentary on it (2005-ish), it was in a retail box with authentic cover and so on, not from tv afaik. There was a part that there were a couple of cameras on a red planet (Mars or venus) that were melting like chocolate. The subtitles in Dutch (It was English, but I couldn't speak English back then) said that it was very hot there. Anyone that knows a documentary that has these things in it?

Thx
